Package game.graphics

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Controller
    The main controller for the game.
    GameLoop
    The Game Loop runs constantly during a game.
    GameWindow
    The Game Window is a class that allows switching from any scene to a game scene.
    Helper
    A helper class that holds reusable methods that might be needed by other various classes
    Renderer
    The renderer is concerned with loading images necessary for the game and providing methods to render these on the screen
    SettingsController
    The controller for the settings page.
    Sprite
    A sprite allows easy manipulation of images and is used to draw these in the renderer
